jetpack-related-posts.title: Muscles and Muscle Groups
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This page is a compendium of resources for targeting the development of specific muscles and muscle groups. r/Weightroom's Weakpoint Wednesday Archive This weekly thread series on r/Weightroom features experienced trainees sharing their advice about what worked best for them. jetpack-related-posts.title: Muscle Building 101
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Introduction There is an illusion of complexity to gaining weight and building muscle (perpetuated largely by people who want your money) but it is actually very straightforward. Your body requires a certain amount of energy (measured in calories) each day in order to fuel its activities. This is called your…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Welcome!
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: TheFitness.Wiki is the official wiki of r/Fitness and r/weightroom on Reddit. Its goal is to provide a high quality hub for information and advice about achieving physical fitness goals - compiled and organized from the best threads and advice from both communities. jetpack-related-posts.title: Adding Physical Activity
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Training, or Exercising? When adding physical activity to your life, it's important to first get clear on whether you want to exercise or train. Mark Rippetoe explains the difference very well: Exercise is physical activity performed for the effect it produces today — right now. [...] Exercise is physical activity done for its own…

jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Welcome to The Fitness Wiki! There's a lot of information to sort through in this Wiki and sometimes, this can be overwhelming. jetpack-related-posts.title: How can I get a six pack / flat stomach / toned abs?
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: As with every other goal here, having defined abs is a matter of having enough muscle mass and low enough body fat. Generally the hardest part of getting a six pack is losing enough body fat to make the bottom portions of the abs show well enough. Just remember: you…
